ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If ye have ever played D&D or Ad&D ye would know that Pal and SHD are Warrior/Priest, a Ranger is a Warrior/Durid and a BARD is a Fighter/Rouge/Druid/Mage
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" i<snip>in order to be a hybrid,
>you must be a combination of 2
>classes (thus the term hybrid). only SHD, PAL, RNG can be >classified in
>this way. you can not name 2 classes that make up >cleric, shaman, druid.
If ye have ever played D&D or Ad&D ye would know that Pal and SHD are
Warrior/Priest, a Ranger is a Warrior/Durid and a BARD is a
Fighter/Rouge/Druid/Mage
>bard is a toss-up, but if it comes down to it can be classified a
> >hybrid<snip>
IMHO I feel that we should get bind and i feel the song should burn mana and
be useable only once per day.

Pinen
19th level bard
Rathe
